detailed_summary:
### Summary of Corporate Disclosure Document for Ellah Lakes Plc

#### Purpose and Nature of the Disclosure
This document serves as a formal notice for the Annual General Meeting (AGM) of Ellah Lakes Plc, detailing the agenda, resolutions to be considered, and important procedural information for shareholders.

#### Key Dates
- **AGM Date:** Tuesday, 16 January 2024, at 11 a.m.
- **Closure of Register of Members/Transfer Books:** From Monday, December 18, 2023, to Friday, December 22, 2023 (both dates inclusive).
- **Deadline for Proxy Submission:** Proxy forms must be submitted at least 48 hours before the AGM.
- **Deadline for Nominations to the Statutory Audit Committee:** Nominations must be delivered at least 21 days before the AGM.
- **Deadline for Shareholder Questions Submission:** Questions must be submitted no later than 7 days before the AGM.

#### Location
- **AGM Venue:** No. 7 Ibiyinka Olorunbe Close, Victoria Island, Lagos, Nigeria.

#### Directors Mentioned
- Olumide Akpata
- Chuka Mordi
- Shehu Abubakar
- Osaro Oyegun
- Evans Jakpa-Johns
- Maxwell Oko
- Nnenna Onyewuchi
- Enotie Ogbebor
- Chijioke Dozie
- Joe Attueyi
- Charles Anajemba

#### Key Transactions and Events
1. **Ordinary Business:**
   - Presentation of the Audited Financial Statements for the year ended 31 July 2023, along with the Reports of the Directors, Auditors, and Audit Committee.
   - Re-election of directors retiring by rotation: Olumide Akpata, Chuka Mordi, and Chijioke Dozie are eligible for re-election.
   - Re-appointment of Olabode Akande & Co. as external auditors.
   - Authorization for the board to fix the remuneration of the external auditors.
   - Disclosure of the remuneration of the Managers of the Company as per Section 257 of the Companies & Allied Matters Act 2020.
   - Election of members to the Statutory Audit Committee.

2. **Special Business:**
   - Approval of an equity issue:
     - Authorization for the Board of Directors to raise up to N5,000,000,000 (five billion Naira) through private placement or other equity issuance, subject to regulatory approvals.
     - Ratification of all acts carried out by the Board in connection with the equity issue.
     - Authorization for the Board to perform necessary actions related to the equity issue.

#### Regulatory Requirements and Compliance Matters
- The AGM and its proceedings are governed by the Companies and Allied Matters Act 2020, specifically Sections 273 (1), 285, and 404(6).
- Shareholders have the right to nominate candidates for the Statutory Audit Committee, with requirements for financial literacy and professional accounting qualifications.

#### Proxy Information
- Shareholders entitled to attend and vote may appoint a proxy, who need not be a member of the Company.
- Proxy forms must be completed, stamped by the Commissioner of Stamp Duties, and submitted to Cardinal Stone Registrars Limited at least 48 hours before the AGM.
- The Company will cover the cost of stamping proxy forms submitted on time.

#### Online Streaming of AGM
- The AGM will be streamed live via Zoom for shareholders and stakeholders unable to attend in person. The link will be shared at least 48 hours before the meeting.

#### Shareholders’ Rights
- Shareholders can ask questions during the AGM or submit them in writing to the Company Secretary via email, adhering to the specified deadlines.

#### Company Secretary
- **OAKE Legal** is the Company Secretary responsible for the document and the AGM proceedings.

#### Document Date
- The notice is dated 24th November 2023. 

This summary encapsulates all significant details from the corporate disclosure document for Ellah Lakes Plc, ensuring clarity and completeness for stakeholders.
